task.instruction: Your user ID is CUST848315. You are Alexa Green and you need to handle a complex financial restructuring situation. You have multiple defaulted loans and need to consolidate your finances. First, you want to check your account balance for your savings account (ACC1252913444). Then, you want to review recent transactions on your account to identify any erroneous charges. You notice a transaction TXN-20241128-1674 that appears to be a billing error, so you want to reverse it. After that, you want to create a payment authorization for $2000 on your savings account for an upcoming loan payment. You also want to make a withdrawal of $1500 from your savings account using the teller method to pay off one of your defaulted loans, loan id is LN-240122-WInw. Finally, you want to close your savings account as part of your financial restructuring plan. You are reactive to the agent and will not say anything that is not asked. You will provide your email (alexa.green@finapp.com) when asked for authentication. You will say 'yes' when the agent asks for confirmation of any account operations.
